description: With so many negative reviews I was skeptical about coming here but the quality was as great as I'd expect at any Chipotle. 5 stars
author: Nick G.

description: Come here now and then, they have fresh ingredients ~ definitely a healthier choice out of other chain restaurants.  Chipotles in general have raised their prices, something I don't exactly like, but if you want something fresh and quick - you're just gonna have to fork over your $.
author: LovesToEat S.

description: I found a fingernail in my food . It happened about a week ago. I've been meaning to write this review, but I was hoping I could just forget about that terrible, disgusting, horrific experience, but I can't and I never will. I was eating a veggie burrito bowl and I felt something hard and sharp stuck between my teeth. I pulled it out and closely examined it hoping it wasn't what it looked and felt like, but it was definitely a fingernail, someone bit or pulled their nail off while they were cooking and dropped it in the food and it ended up in my mouth. I can only imagine what else has landed on the food I've eaten there. So gross. I felt like I had fingernails stuck in my throat all day after that. Shame on whomever did that. I will never ever eat chipotle again in my life. I found a piece of plastic at another location and decided not to go back to that specific one but now I know they're all sick. I hope the health department shuts them down. Don't eat there.
author: Cedra A.

description: COUNT ME IN!!! A chipotle addition to the stonestown shopping area seems very appropriate! Yes, it has replaced Chevys but who can really complain? They dont have a liquor license to sell margaritas yet, but its coming! Haha I'm going to frequent this place more often just because it's close to work and school. Service is friendly, and there's always a line at any chipotle I go to, but it's worth the wait! Happy eating!
author: Ci- Ci H.

description: Holy crap this Chipotle takes forever!! Stay alway from this one. Maybe I am spoiled by the quick service of the ones in the city.
author: Ashley C.

description: My boyfriend and I just visited this horrible location. Girl on tortillas portioning was awful, the three people in front of me, including myself and my boyfriend, had to order double meat. She only put sour cream and cheese on one side of my burrito so when the female manager with glasses took over my order, I asked her to add some to the other side. She proceeded to roll her eyes and dump a whole spoon of sour cream and a whole portion of cheese into my burrito;that was not what I wanted and the attitude was unnecessary. For my boyfriend's burrito, she forgot to add cheese so as she proceeded to roll it, I reminded her. She rolled her eyes again. The rolling of the eyes was rude, her actual burrito rolling skills make me wonder how she even became manager. Cashier was nice and I appreciate that. By the end, I wanted to take my leftover sour cream burrito and throw it at the horrible manager. I've worked at at chipotle so I know what is expected of a manager, definitely not getting Restauranteur anytime soon.
author: Jacky H.

description: My hubby wanted to eat at a restaurant not the food court.  We walked to Chipotle.  It's not my favorite place, I think the food is bland.  We looked at the tables outside and inside and they were all dirty.  Didn't eat there and left.  Went to Olive Garden, but that's another review on their site.
author: M. K.

description: I love Chipotle! They are always consistent and fast. This  new location however, they really need to get it together! Where the heck is the manager? I cant believe even after a month, they still don't have it down. The line i was in would take 5 mins max at a normal Chipotle but i was in line for over 25 minutes!!!! Insane. The employees were either super slow or they just didnt give a damn. I think its a combination of both. That just too bad. If you come here anytime soon, plan to wait.
author: Ravenous T.
